institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Internal human resource development support project operation rules/Article 37 (Monitoring)
contents: Article 37 (Monitoring) ① The head of the affiliated organization that has jurisdiction over the center must frequently monitor the center's project cost execution details, project progress status, etc., ② The head of the affiliated organization visits the center once a quarter to monitor the implementation status and performance, etc. ③ If corrective action is necessary or participation performance is poor as a result of monitoring, the head of the affiliated organization must take necessary action and report important matters to the chairman.
